attributes.action: Allow Students from A level to Postgraduate have half fare travel NATIONWIDE on all forms of Public Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The privatisation of Transport by region means that students have to pay full fare to travel outside their own region, and sometimes insie their region, without buying £20+ travel cards for speicific rail zones. This is probably the age where most inter-county travel is done, especially as many students choose to study away from home. A national system has been put into place for the elderly and disabled for FREE travel, can it not be possible for us to be cut a little slack?
